typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
FixNames derive(each(match(/* Match all columns of type String */ type=='string'), $$ + '_trimmed' = trim(toString($$))),
		each(match(type=='integer'), 'int_' + $$ = toInteger($$))) ~> RenameColumns
source1 derive(year = toInteger(year),
		movie = toInteger(movie),
		Rating = toInteger(Rating),
		{Rotton Tomato} = toInteger({Rotton Tomato})) ~> Casting
Select1 select(mapColumn(
		movie,
		title,
		genres,
		year,
		Rating,
		{Rotton Tomato}
	)) ~> FixNames
RenameColumns select(mapColumn(
		title_trimmed,
		genres_trimmed,
		int_movie,
		int_year,
		int_rating,
		int_rottentomato
	)) ~> RemoveOldNames
Casting select(mapColumn(
		each(match(true()))
	)) ~> Select1
RemoveOldNames sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> sink1
